overview:
Emerson Fann co-founded Eastside Partners in 2005 and is the Managing Partner. His focus is on investment opportunities in healthcare. Prior to Eastside, Emerson was a Partner at Southeastern Technology Fund where he joined in 1998 as that firmâ€™s first investment professional.

Southeastern funded 24 separate information technology businesses and generated top quartile returns for its investors. At Southeastern, Emerson was active with MedMined (sold to Cardinal Health), Emageon (IPO and subsequent sale to Amicus), Investment Scorecard (sold to Informa Solutions), Castlebridge Technologies (sold to Software Technology Inc.), and Mobular Technologies.
